name: @bxm/pro-request
description: This library wraps the request library with an ES6 promise

scripts.test: node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --reporter dot --ui bdd --compilers js:babel/register tests/setup.js tests/ --recursive
scripts.cover: node node_modules/babel-istanbul/lib/cli cover --root ./src --include-all-sources --dir ./coverage --report cobertura --report html --hook-run-in-context ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --ui bdd --compilers js:babel/register tests/setup.js tests/ --recursive
scripts.tdd: node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -w --watch-extensions jsx --compilers js:babel/register --reporter nyan tests/setup.js tests/ --recursive
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
